response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations, offering unparalleled value and functionality. Given its exceptional quality, it's worth $15,000 to you, but I'm considering your unique position and am willing to offer it to you at a special price. My proposal is to extend this opportunity to you for $12,000. This offer not only provides you with significant savings but also ensures that you're acquiring an item that meets your highest standards. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
